title: News24.com | Former Congo president Yhombi Opango, 81, dies of coronavirus in France
description: Former Republic of Congo president Jacques Joaquim Yhombi Opango has died in France of the novel coronavirus (Covid-19), according to his family. He was 81.
content:
Brazzaville
– Former Republic of Congo president Jacques Joaquim Yhombi Opango died in
France on Monday of the novel coronavirus (Covid-19), his family told AFP. He
was 81.
Yhombi Opango, who led
Congo-Brazzaville from 1977 until he was toppled in 1979, … [+2029 chars]
